pullRequest.title: [NETBEANS-4443] PHP 8.0 Support: Mixed type v2
pullRequest.bodyText:
https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/NETBEANS-4443


https://wiki.php.net/rfc/mixed_type_v2


Fix the PHP5ColoringLexer.flex and PHPTokenId (lexer)


Fix the UnusableTypesUnhandledError (mixed type can only be used as a standalone type)


Add PhpVersion.hasMixedType()


Index the mixed type (FunctionScopeImpl and MethodScopeImpl)


Add unit tests for the parser, the lexer, and the code generation(for implement/override methods) features


Fix the code completion feature


Add/Fix unit tests for the code completion feature


PHP 8.0 (Project Properties)

PHP 7.4 (Project Properties) mixed can be used as a class name

UnusableTypesUnhandledError

commit.message:
[NETBEANS-4443] PHP 8.0 Support: Mixed type v2 (Part 1)

- https://wiki.php.net/rfc/mixed_type_v2
- Fix the PHP5ColoringLexer.flex and `PHPTokenId` (lexer)
- Fix the `UnusableTypesUnhandledError` (mixed type can only be used as a standalone type)
- Add `PhpVersion.hasMixedType()`
- Index the mixed type (`FunctionScopeImpl` and `MethodScopeImpl`)
- Add unit tests for the parser, the lexer, and the code generation(for implement/override methods) features

[NETBEANS-4443] PHP 8.0 Support: Mixed type v2 (Part 2)

- https://wiki.php.net/rfc/mixed_type_v2
- Fix the code completion feature
- Add/Fix unit tests for the code completion feature

nodes.bodyText: Note: I really like this approach instead of plenty of ifs in the codebase.
